overview:

He has partnered with large consumer brands and trusted iconic influencers to deepen emotional connections from these brands to their consumers. His development of CREAMâ„¢ on-line and mobile platform, provides better financial services, social rewards, mobile banking services and loyalty programs at lower costs to the consumer loaded market.

Partnering with a numerous amount of young, fresh, and innovative brands throughout his career to spearhead their marketing and operations in retail was key to ensuring their relevance within niche markets which has lead to multiple financial technology licensing partnerships he is currently executing on.

In addition to creating successful and innovative financial solutions for online and brick and mortar retailers, Stephen Chase has applied over a decade of experience in Brand Building, Trend Forecasting, and Logistics to a virtually untapped industry.
